sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import {Box, Typography, Button, TextField, Link} from '@mui/material' import rpaper from './rpaper.jpg' import google from './google.png' import { auth, provider } from './config' import { signInWithPopup } from 'firebase/auth' import Home from './Home' const Signup = () => { const [value,setValue] = useState('') const handleClick = () =>{ signInWithPopup(auth, provider).then((data)=>{ console.log(data.user) setValue(data.user.email) localStorage.setItem("email",data.user.email) .catch((error) => { console.log('Error signing in with Google:', error); }); }) } useEffect(()=>{ setValue(localStorage.getItem('email')) value?:<> }) return ( SignUp
Already have an account? Login Or { }
) } export default Signup
